short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate this extension that Convert any image that Supports JPG, PNG formats.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install our Image Converter Chrome extension, you can convert images quickly. Our conversion supports JPG, PNG, and JPEG formats. It can quickly transform the users images without losing quality in the process. 
 
Whether you are a project manager or a simple user who wants to save images, share pictures, or work with photo files, our image converter extension will be useful. For anyone working with digital images, it is essential because of its clear interface and the speed of conversion.  

Key Features of this chrome extension 

Wide Format Support: Convert snap shots among JPG, PNG, JPEG formats. 

High-Quality Conversion: Maintain the original first-rate of your images all through the conversion procedure. 

Fast and Efficient: Quickly convert pictures with minimal load times. 

No File Size Limits: Convert snap shots of any length without restrictions. 

Secure and Private: Your pictures are processed securely without being saved on-line. 

How to Use 

Step 1: Install the Extension 

Go to the Chrome Web Store, search for "Image Converter," and click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension. 

Step 2: Open the Extension 

Once established, click at the extension icon within the Chrome toolbar to open it. 

Step 3: Upload Your Image 

Click the "Upload" button and pick out the picture record you want to convert out of your device. 

Step 4: Choose Output Format and Convert 

Select the preferred output format (JPG, PNG, and other formats.) from the dropdown menu for downloading. 

To Whom is it Useful? 

This extension is particularly beneficial for photographers, picture designers, web builders, and social media managers who often work with diverse photograph formats and need a short and reliable tool for photo conversion. 

Why is it Useful?

It simplifies the technique of converting images, saving effort and time while ensuring top-notch effects. Users now do not need to rely upon a couple of gears or software for one-of-a-kind codecs, making it an all-in-one answer for picture control. 

FAQs 

1. Can I convert multiple images at once?  

No, currently the extension supports converting one image at a time. 

2. Is there a file size limit for conversion?  

No, you can convert images of any size without restrictions. 

3. Does the extension work offline?  

Yes, the conversion process does not require an internet connection. 

4. Are my images stored online?  

No, your images are processed locally and are not uploaded or stored online. 

5. Can I convert animated GIFs? 

 Yes, but the conversion will only retain the first frame of the GIF.
